Actually, we should make gazebo to depend on one of the virtuals: ```libcurl-ssl-dev or libcurl4-dev```.

AFAIK, moving package dependencies from openssl to gnutls will make impossible to install ROS with Gazebo. Some people [asked](http://answers.ros.org/question/34495/dependency-problem-libcurl4-openssl-dev-vs-libcurl4-gnutls-dev/) for the same movement in ROS, some work was even [committed to rosdistro](https://github.com/ros/rosdistro/pull/57) but the same work [was reverted](https://github.com/ros/rosdistro/commit/887346590cfefc0b6c1cd0288058d7c6a6c289bf) since rosdep is not able to handle virtuals yet.

Actually, we should make gazebo to depend on one of the virtuals: libcurl-ssl-dev or libcurl4-dev.

AFAIK, moving package dependencies from openssl to gnutls will make impossible to install ROS with Gazebo. Some people asked for the same movement in ROS, some work was even committed to rosdistro but the same work was reverted since rosdep is not able to handle virtuals yet.
